## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] No duplicated logic added
- [ ] Feature is tenant-safe (for SaaS)

### Tests

- [ ] Tests updated or created  
      (Tip: Use @saas-tests create tests for <file>)

### Documentation

- [ ] Docs updated if needed  
      (Tip: @saas-docs update documentation for this PR)

### Security

- [ ] No sensitive data logged
- [ ] Permissions correctly applied  
      (Tip: @saas-security audit this PR)

### Architecture

- [ ] Follows project structure  
      (Tip: @saas-architect review changes)
